{"id":1129423160,"question_id":3250,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1703656088,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"387 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1129423160/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Square Area by Removing Fences From a Field","memory":"60.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int MOD = 1000000007;\n    public int maximizeSquareArea(int m, int n, int[] hFences, int[] vFences) {\n        int max_area = -1;\n        if(m==n){\n            return ((m-1)*(n-1))%MOD;\n        }\n        \n        int l1 = hFences.length;\n        int l2 = vFences.length;\n        \n        int[] h = Arrays.copyOf(hFences, l1 + 2);\n        h[l1] = 1;\n        h[l1+1] = m;\n        \n        int[] v = Arrays.copyOf(vFences, l2 + 2);\n        v[l2] = 1;\n        v[l2+1] = n;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(h);\n        Arrays.sort(v);\n        \n        Set<Integer> hs = new HashSet<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<h.length-1;i++){\n            for(int j=i+1;j<h.length;j++){\n                hs.add(h[j]-h[i]);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        Set<Integer> vs = new HashSet<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<v.length-1;i++){\n            for(int j=i+1;j<v.length;j++){\n                if(hs.contains(v[j]-v[i])){\n                    max_area = Math.max(max_area, v[j]-v[i]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if(max_area == -1){\n            return -1;\n        }\n        \n        return (int) ((1L * max_area * max_area) % MOD);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-square-area-by-removing-fences-from-a-field","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
